list.name: Releases
list.query: SELECT title, description from annotations WHERE $timeFilter order by time asc
list.rawQuery: select extract(epoch from time) AS time, title as text, description as tags from sannotations where $__timeFilter(time)

panels.description: Stacked times from open to lgtm, approve and merge.

targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  value as "Median time from open to LGTM (in hours)"
from
  stime_metrics
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'tmet[[repogroup]][[size]][[kind]][[apichange]]medo2l'
order by
  time

select
  time,
  value as "Median time from LGTM to approve (in hours)"
from
  stime_metrics
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'tmet[[repogroup]][[size]][[kind]][[apichange]]medl2a'
order by
  time

select
  time,
  value as "Median time from approve to merge (in hours)"
from
  stime_metrics
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'tmet[[repogroup]][[size]][[kind]][[apichange]]meda2m'
order by
  time

panels.title: Median time PRs from open to lgtm, approve, merge for [[repogroup_name]] repository group ([[period]], API change: [[apichange]], Size: [[size_name]], Kind: [[kind_name]])

list.label: Repository group
list.name: repogroup_name
list.query: select all_repo_group_name from tall_repo_groups order by 1

list.name: repogroup
list.query: select all_repo_group_value from tall_repo_groups where all_repo_group_name = '[[repogroup_name]]'

list.definition: select repo_name from trepos order by 1
list.label: Repository
list.name: repo_name
list.query: select repo_name from trepos order by 1

list.definition: select repo_value from trepos where repo_name = '[[repo_name]]'
list.name: repo
list.query: select repo_value from trepos where repo_name = '[[repo_name]]'

list.label: Size
list.name: size_name
list.query: select size_labels_name_with_all from tsize_labels_with_all order by 1

list.name: size
list.query: select size_labels_value_with_all from tsize_labels_with_all where size_labels_name_with_all = '[[size_name]]'

list.name: full_name
list.query: select value_s from gha_vars where name = 'full_name'

current.text:
Kubernetes PR Time to Approve and Merge dashboard

Links:

  • Metric SQL file.
  • TSDB series definition. Search for time_metrics
  • Grafana dashboard JSON.

Description

  • This dashboard show median and 85th percentile time for merged PRs from open to LGTM, approve and merge.
  • LGTM happens when lgtm label is added on a PR.
  • Approve happens when approved label is added on a PR.
  • Open to LGTM time is defined as time from open to LGTM when LGTM is present or from open to approve when approve is present or from open to merge if neither lgtm nor approve is present.
  • It means that adding approved label when there is no lgtm label means LGTM too. Merging PR without approve or lgtm labels also means LGTM.
  • LGTM to approve is defined as time from LGTM to approve when approve is present or from lgtm to merge if there is no approved label. If there is no LGTM this is zero.
  • It means that merging PR means approving it.
  • Approve to merge is defined as time from approve to merge if approved label is present. It is zero otherwise.
  • You can filter by PR size. PR size is defined by size/* label. You can select All to get all PRs.
  • You can select PRs with a specific kind/* label or summary for all of them.
  • You can filter by API change. PR belongs to API change yes when it has kind/api-change label. You can select All to get all PRs.
  • You can select single repository group or summary for all of them.
  • Selecting period (for example week) means that dashboard will data for PRs created in those periods.
  • See here for more informations about periods.
  • See here for more informations about repository groups.
current.value:
Kubernetes PR Time to Approve and Merge dashboard

Links:

  • Metric SQL file.
  • TSDB series definition. Search for time_metrics
  • Grafana dashboard JSON.

Description

  • This dashboard show median and 85th percentile time for merged PRs from open to LGTM, approve and merge.
  • LGTM happens when lgtm label is added on a PR.
  • Approve happens when approved label is added on a PR.
  • Open to LGTM time is defined as time from open to LGTM when LGTM is present or from open to approve when approve is present or from open to merge if neither lgtm nor approve is present.
  • It means that adding approved label when there is no lgtm label means LGTM too. Merging PR without approve or lgtm labels also means LGTM.
  • LGTM to approve is defined as time from LGTM to approve when approve is present or from lgtm to merge if there is no approved label. If there is no LGTM this is zero.
  • It means that merging PR means approving it.
  • Approve to merge is defined as time from approve to merge if approved label is present. It is zero otherwise.
  • You can filter by PR size. PR size is defined by size/* label. You can select All to get all PRs.
  • You can select PRs with a specific kind/* label or summary for all of them.
  • You can filter by API change. PR belongs to API change yes when it has kind/api-change label. You can select All to get all PRs.
  • You can select single repository group or summary for all of them.
  • Selecting period (for example week) means that dashboard will data for PRs created in those periods.
  • See here for more informations about periods.
  • See here for more informations about repository groups.

list.name: docs
list.query: select value_s from gha_vars where name = 'pr_approve_to_merge_docs_html'

list.label: Kind
list.name: kind_name
list.query: select sigm_lbl_kind_name_with_all from tsigm_lbl_kinds_with_all where sigm_lbl_kind_name_with_all in ('All', 'bug', 'feature', 'design', 'cleanup', 'documentation', 'flake', 'kep') order by 1;

list.name: kind
list.query: select sigm_lbl_kind_value_with_all from tsigm_lbl_kinds_with_all where sigm_lbl_kind_name_with_all = '[[kind_name]]'

title: PR Time to Approve and Merge
